issues.title: Food with Matt
issues.description: Matt has been eating my snacks withough asking me first and it's really frustrating.

moods.comment: I talked to him today about the issue.
His behavior has not changed at all!
I just wish he could at least ask me first.
He did not it again but he has not talked to me
I talked to him today about the issue.
He cannot take responsibility of his own actions
I think it is starting to get resolved, but I am not sure
